text: Brown Candover is a village in Hampshire, England. The village belongs to the parish of the Candovers and its nearest town is New Alresford, away from the village. ==Governance== The village of Brown Candover is part of the civil parish of Candovers, and is part of the Upton Grey and the Candovers ward of Basingstoke and Deane borough council. The borough council is a Non- metropolitan district of Hampshire County Council. ==See also== * Chilton Candover * Preston Candover ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Hampshire
title: Brown Candover
